question_list.question_title: How does the user create a new project?
question_list.question_answer: In Dashboard click on the plus icon or go to the project tab from the side menu and click on the plus icon for create new project.

question_list.question_title: How can edit an existing project?
question_list.question_answer: Go to the project list page and the user can see the edit project option from the 3 dot menu.

question_list.question_title: How can add milestones to the project?
question_list.question_answer: Go to the project list page click on a particular project, select the overview tab, user can see add milestone button.

question_list.question_title: How can the user copy link?
question_list.question_answer: Go to the project list page and the user can copy the link from the 3 dot menu.

question_list.question_title: How can the user add a new task to a particular project?
question_list.question_answer: On the project list page user can see add task button in listing items and add the task option from the 3 dot menu.

question_list.question_title: How to add a favorite and unfavourite project?
question_list.question_answer: On the project list page, the user can tap the star icon to add a favorite project and remove a favorite project.
Go to the project list page and the user can see the delete project from the 3 dot menu.

question_list.question_title: How can the user restore deleted project ?
question_list.question_answer: Go to the Archive items tab from the side menu, select the project tab, user can see the restore button.

question_list.question_title: How do users create a new task?
question_list.question_answer: In Dashboard click on the plus icon or go to the task tab from the side menu and click on the plus icon to create new task.

question_list.question_title: How can edit an existing task?
question_list.question_answer: Go to the task list page and user can see the edit task from the 3 dot menu.
Go to the task list page and the user can see the complete task option from 3 dot menu.
Go to the task list page and the user can see the delete task option from 3 dot menu.
Go to task list page and user can copy link from 3 dot menu.
Go to the task list page and the user can move from 3 dot menu

question_list.question_title: How can the user add a sub task?
question_list.question_answer: Go to the task list page, click on a particular task, user can add subtask by click on the plus icon.

question_list.question_title: How can the user start, stop, pause the timer for a particular task?
question_list.question_answer: Go to the task list page, click on a particular task, user can start, stop, pause the timer by click on the timer icon.

question_list.question_title: How can add milestones to the task?
question_list.question_answer: User can add milestone when add task and edit task time select project then user can select milestone that available in project.

question_list.question_title: How can users invite members for projects, tasks, and teams?
question_list.question_answer: Click on team member from sidemenu and user can see plus icon for add team member.
Click on the user profile icon, the user can see the profile screen and edit the profile.
